name: Shrink Your Habitica Tasks
description:
Just makes everything smaller, more compact, and get's rid of the searchbar, and with the addition of Monthis's Collapsed Task Notes code, the description now is collapsed and can be seen when hovering over the task--this can now also be done with checklists.

Here's an alternative for the button and font size by Mareinna.
additional_info:
The profile icons are now located on the right, the profile links are centered, and the stat info is aligned to the right. Also, the create task text boxes are shrunk with the plus icon hidden. Lastly, the filter button is moved up, located now underneath the view party button, and the popup now has a scroll wheel.
-------
The Edit Avatar links are centered (except for skin). Changed the notification and message scroll wheels to just have the vertical ones.
-------
Fixed the odd overlapping in the character stat area and in the chat.
-------
Task check-off buttons are now bigger. The code to collapse the checklists until hover has been removed since the devs have incorporated a button to do the same. With the new button, the padding has been shrunk for a more compact look. Also, the filter has been raised to be under the top navigation bar.
-------
Automatic closing of the skills has been removed because it interferes with the ability to feed pets.
-------
Realigned the gem and members containers in the guilds/parties and the tag filter container.
-------
Added collapsed checklists.
-------
Added collapsed task notes.
-------
Got rid of the searchbar.
-------
Shrinks and compacts tasks.

discussions.name: Another style has the ability to collapse drawers and allows you to feed your pets
